channel.title: Karamja wall door. [pi] need it to open

item.title: Karamja wall door. [pi] need it to open
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

ok i got this code completly added whitout errors…

case 983: // brasskey if(!c.hasbrasskey() && c.absX != 2836) { c.sendMessage("You need to have a brasskey to enter here!"); return; } if(c.absY == 9599 && c.absX == 2836 && c.heightLevel == 0 && c.hasbrasskey()) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2836, 9600, 0); c.sendMessage("Your brass crumbles to dust when you open the door!"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Elvarg lair!"); c.getItems().deleteItem(893, 1); } else if (c.absY == 9600 && c.absX == 2836 && c.heightLevel == 0) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2836, 9599, 0); } break;

but the only thing is when i go ingame it wont open still… i dont know why but it wont… if someone knows why please share the info whit me… but i think its the thing in the config.java that stops you from opening more than 100 doors or something

Read full topic
